channel.title: I need some serious help with sheild slots and weapon slots
channel.description: Cheezscape 78 is the source, You can go on and look at the server and tell me what's wrong lol..But When I try to weild a book/gloves it goes in the weapon slot..= I would like some help on this please.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 08, 2006, 12:43:37 AM[/size][hr]Please? I really really need help =. :(
